definitions.definition: A raised platform built from the shore out over water , supported on piles ; used to secure , or provide access to shipping ; a jetty .
examples: Your boat is docked at the pier .

definitions.definition: A similar structure , especially at a seaside resort , used to provide entertainment .
examples: There is a gaming arcade on the pier .

definitions.definition: A structure supporting the junction between two spans of a bridge .
A rectangular pillar , or similar structure, that supports an arch , wall or roof , or the hinges of a gate.

main_definition: A raised platform built from the shore out over water , supported on piles ; used to secure , or provide access to shipping ; a jetty .
secondary_definitions: A similar structure , especially at a seaside resort , used to provide entertainment .
A structure supporting the junction between two spans of a bridge .
( architecture ) A rectangular pillar , or similar structure, that supports an arch , wall or roof , or the hinges of a gate.
